scripts.push: npm run lib:build && npm run lib:push && npm run src:push
scripts.lib:build: rm -rf lib/ && BABEL_ENV=production && babel _production/styled --out-dir lib/styled --copy-files && babel _production/components --out-dir lib/components --copy-files && babel _production/assets --out-dir lib/assets --copy-files
scripts.lib:push: zip -d design-system.framerx lib/* && zip -ur design-system.framerx lib
scripts.restore: cp _base.framerx design-system.framerx && zip -ur design-system.framerx lib/* && zip -ur design-system.framerx code/* design/*
